title: Fastest supercomputers - number of computer cores 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location, and Number of cores in each Location on the y axis.
The Number of cores is highest at Location Sunway TaihuLight  China and lowest at Location Lassen United States.
There is a difference of 10361312.0 between the maximum Location Sunway TaihuLight  China and minimum Location Lassen United States.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Location, and Number of cores in each Location on the y axis.
The Number of cores is appeared to be the highest at Location Sunway TaihuLight  China and lowest at Location Lassen United States.
Second maximum Number of cores is found at Location Tianhe-2A China.
The highest value at Location Sunway TaihuLight  China is 36.94x times more than the lowest value at Lassen United States.

Location Sunway TaihuLight  China is higher than any other Locations with value 10649600.0, followed by Tianhe-2A China, and Summit United States. Down to Location Lassen United States with the lowest value 288288.0.
The Location Lassen United States has 4.75 times less Number of cores than average.
The Number of cores is 22419648.0 if we add up values of all Locations.
